tool.name: Chemical

tool.name: Metalwork

process.name: Purify rock salt into compounds
process.description: http://www.madehow.com/Volume-2/Salt.html One method of evaporating brine is solar evaporation. Most brine is processed by a multiple-effect vacuum evaporator. This device consists of three or more closed metal cylinders with conical bottoms. Brine is first treated chemically to remove calcium and magnesium compounds. It then fills the bottom. Brine may also be processed in a grainer.

Make pulp from cane fiber and crop waste (large batch)
Make paper, napkin and toilet tissue from pulp
Make paper, napkin and toilet tissue from pulp (large batch)
Make bleaching chemical for paper making
Make bleaching chemical for paper making (large batch)
Make sodium hypochlorite for bleaching and sanitation
Make sodium hypochlorite for bleaching and sanitation (large batch)
Make crop fertilizers
Make Nitrites
process.description: 1 mole of N2 : 14 g 1 mole of O2 : 16 g For Nitrite NO2(-1) 14 g/mole N + 32 g/mole O = 46 g/mole NO2(-1)

process.name: Make Nitrates
process.description: 1 mole of N2 : 14 g 1 mole of O2 : 16 g For Nitrate NO3(-2) 14 g/mole N + 48 g/mole O = 62 g/mole NO3(-2)

process.name: Do carbon monoxide iron reduction
process.description: Fe<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3CO -> 2Fe + 3CO<sub>2</sub>

process.name: Do hydrogen iron reduction
process.description: Fe<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3H<sub>2</sub> -> 2Fe + 3H<sub>2</sub>O

process.name: Cast aluminum ingot
process.description: Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3C -> 2Al + 3CO; 1 mole - Al2CO3: 101.96g; 3C: 36g; 2Al: 54g; 3CO: 64g

process.name: Cast aluminum ingot (large batch)
process.description: Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3C -> 2Al + 3CO

process.name: Make aluminum sheet
process.description: Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> + 3C -> 2Al + 3CO

process.name: Produce ethylene glycol
process.description:
This is to produce ethylene glycol (CH2OH)2. Ethylene glycol is produced from ethylene (ethene), via the intermediate ethylene oxide.
Ethylene oxide reacts with water to produce ethylene glycol according to the chemical equation:
C2H4O + H2O â†’ HOâˆ’CH2CH2âˆ’OH 44 g 18 g 62 g

process.name: Produce polyester fiber
process.description:
This is to produce polyester fiber. https://www.britannica.com/science/Polyethylene-terephthalate
Ethylene glycol + C10H10O4 -> Polyester fiber (PET) + 2H2O 62 g 194 g 220 g 36 g

process.name: Produce Dimethyl Terephthalate
process.description:
This is to produce dimethyl terephthalate. Molar mass : 194.186 Dimethyl terephthalate (DMT) is an organic compound with the formula C6H4(COOCH3)2 or C10H10O4;
It is the diester formed from terephthalic acid and methanol. It is a white solid that melts to give a distillable colourless liquid.
DMT can also be made by a different route, namely direct esterification of terephthalic acid with methanol. The dimethyl terephthalate that is formed is then purified by distillation. Even terephthalic acid of low purity may be used in this method.
C8H6O4 + 2CH3OH â†’ C10H10O4 + 2 H2O 16.6 g 64 g 194 g 36 g in the presence of o-xylene at 250â€“300 Â°C.

process.name: Produce Terephthalic Acid
process.description:
This is to produce terephthalic acid. C8H6O4 Molar mass : 166 In the Amoco process, which is widely adopted worldwide, terephthalic acid is produced by catalytic oxidation of p-Xylene (C8H10):
C8H10 + 3O2 --> C8H6O4 + 2H2O 106 g 48 g 166 g 36 g
The process uses a cobaltâ€“manganeseâ€“bromide catalyst. The bromide source can be sodium bromide, hydrogen bromide or tetrabromoethane.

process.name: Produce Polyester Resin
process.description: This is to produce unsaturated polyester resin (C<sub>10</sub>H<sub>8</sub>O<sub>4</sub>). We don't have a detailed process for producing polyester, so we're just using component elements.

process.name: Roll mylar film
process.description: Mylar film that can be coated with evaporated aluminum on one side

process.name: Roll aluminized mylar foil
process.description: Biaxially oriented PET film is metallized by vapor deposition of a thin film of evaporated aluminum, gold, or other metal onto it.

process.name: Make Liquid Cooling Garment
process.description: The Liquid Cooling and Ventilation Garment (LCVG) serves to regulate the transport water-vapor from the body and maximize thermal conductivity to maintain astronaut comfort. See technical papers at https://www.science.gov/topicpages/v/ventilation+garment+lcvg

process.name: Make EVA backpack
process.description: Polyethylene box with steel frame and fiberglass cloth straps.

process.name: Make EVA antenna
process.description: Using reinforced fiberglass wrapped in aluminum sheeting to make antenna.

process.name: Assemble a RepairBot
process.description: The parts list for assembling the hardware of a repair bot.

process.name: Assemble EVA suit
process.description:
http://www.madehow.com/Volume-5/Spacesuit.html. Raw Materials for making EVA suits Numerous raw materials are used for constructing a spacesuit. Fabric materials include a variety of different synthetic polymers.
- The innermost layer is made up of a Nylon tricot material. - Another layer is composed of spandex, an elastic wearable polymer. - There is also a layer of urethane-coated nylon, which is involved in pressurization. - Dacronâ€”a type of polyesterâ€”is used for a pressure-restraining layer. - Other synthetic fabrics used include Neoprene that is a type of sponge rubber, aluminized Mylar, Gortex, Kevlar, and Nomex.
Beyond synthetic fibers other raw materials have important roles. - Fiberglass is the primary material for the hard upper torso segment. - Lithium hydroxide is used in making the filter which removes carbon dioxide and water vapor during a space walk. - A silver zinc blend comprises the battery that powers the suit. - Plastic tubing is woven into the fabric to transport cooling water throughout the suit. - A polycarbonate material is used for constructing the shell of the helmet.
Various other components are used to make up the electronic circuitry and suit controls.

process.name: Manufacture rover windshield
process.description: The rover windshield use a double stack of aerogel tiles between two layers of glass for insulation.

process.name: Manufacture window
process.description: Each window panel use a double stack of aerogel tiles between two layers of glass for trapping heat.

process.name: Convert bio-based oil into hydraulic fluid
Roll heat pipe from copper sheet
Roll heat pipe from aluminum sheet
Do potassium chloride electrolysis

process.name: Manufacture battery module
process.description: At operating voltage of 4.2V, the lithium content is 0.075g/Wh. For a cathode material (LiMn1.5Ni0.5O4) on a lithium ion battery, when cycled at C/30 in the 2.5-4.3V voltage range, the theoretical capacity of LiNMC Q_specific is 165 mAh g-1. or 160 Ah kg-1. At 3.8V, 3.8V * 160 mAh g-1 = 608 Wh kg-1. Content is 1.6447 kg/kWh.

process.name: Manufacture EVA battery
process.description: Assume a small EVA battery has the capacity of 0.5kWh.

process.name: Manufacture polycarbonate roofing
process.description: Assume each roofing tile is 2m x 2m Asahi/Chi Mei produces DPC (polycarbonate) from DMC which is produced via methanolysis of ethylene carbonate. Ethylene carbonate is produced by the reaction between ethyleneâ€…oxide and carbonâ€…dioxide. Sandwiched inside are double stacks of aerogel tiles.

process.name: Produce bisphenol-a
process.description: Bisphenol A (BPA), a colourless crystalline solid belonging to the family of organic compounds; its molecular formula is C15H16O2. BPA is best known for its use in the manufacture of polycarbonate plastics and epoxy resins

process.name: Make ceramic electrolyte
process.description: Ceramic electrolytes are critical for the production of batteries and fuel cells

process.name: Make methane solid oxide fuel cells
process.description: Each methane solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) can generate 200W. Each fuel cell weighs 0.2 kg.

process.name: Make methanol fuel cells
process.description: Each methanol fuel cell (SOFC) can generate 200W. Each fuel cell weighs 0.2 kg.

process.name: Make methane fuel cell stack
process.description:
Each fuel cell stack comprises 75 solid oxide fuel cells at 15 kWe.
Two steps : Reforming: CH4 + 2H2O -> CO2 + 4H2 Fuel cell operation: 4H2 + 2O2 -> 4H2O Overall: CH4 + 2O2 -> CO2 + 4H2 + 2H2O
References : 1. http://large.stanford.edu/courses/2023/ph240/thierstein2/ 2. https://www.mtu.edu/news/2023/04/an-energy-breakthrough-tech-researchers-create-new-type-of-fuel-cell.html 3. https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-023-43388-8 4. https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0959652621000974 5. https://www.greenh2world.com/post/methane-fuel-cells-powering-the-future-with-clean-energy 6. https://pubs.rsc.org/en/content/articlelanding/2017/ra/c7ra05245f

process.name: Make methanol fuel cell stack
process.description:
Each fuel cell stack comprises 75 solid oxide fuel cells at 15 kW.
For Direct methanol fuel cells (DMFCs), 1. Anode reaction: CH3OH + H2O â†’ 6H+ + 6e- + CO2 2. Cathode reaction: 3/2O2 + 6H+ + 6e- â†’ 3H2O 3. Overall reaction: CH3OH + 3/2O2 â†’ 2H2O + CO2
For indirect methanol fuel cells, a. Entity 1: Steam Reforming Reaction Chemical Formula: CHâ‚ƒOH + Hâ‚‚O â†’ CO + 3Hâ‚‚ b. Entity 2: Fuel Cell Reaction Overall Reaction: 3Hâ‚‚ + COâ‚‚ â†’ 3Hâ‚‚O + electrical energy

process.name: gasify sugarcane and biomass into methanol
process.description: Use biomass gasification to derive methanol, which is useful for powering PEM fuel cells.

process.name: Make aerogel tile
process.description:
Aerogel is a porous, translucent material that could allow sunlight to penetrate and be trapped, thus acting as a better insulator and having stronger tensile strengthe fiberglass composite. It's made by extracting liquid from silica gel to create a thin, 2-to-3 cm layer of aerogel via supercritical CO2 drying. Doping it with crossliking agents provide improved mechanical properties. See aerogel.org/?p=1058.
The empiral formula of aerogel is simply SiO2. SiO2: 60 g/mol, CO2: 44 g/mol, Si: 28 g/mol, O: 32 g/mol
The silica solidifies into three-dimensional, intertwined clusters that make up only 3% of the volume. Conduction through the solid is therefore very low. The remaining 97% of the volume is composed of air in extremely small nanopores. The air has little room to move, inhibiting both convection and gas-phase conduction.

process.name: Make Paraffin Composites
process.description: Create paraffin using high density polyethylene (HDPE) composites as form-stable solid-liquid phase change material (PCM) for thermal energy storage purposes such as in EVA suit's liquid cooling garment.

process.name: Make Thermoplastic Elastomer
process.description: https://tractus3d.com/materials/tpe/ https://www.elastomer.kuraray.com/blog/what-is-tpe/#processing

process.name: Make Silicone Elastomer
process.description: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Silicone_rubber

process.name: Make Power Panel
process.description: A power panel safely distributes electricity throughout a building. It divides an electrical power feed into branch circuits, while providing a protective circuit breaker or fuse for each circuit, in a common enclosure. A panelboard services to protect branch circuits from overloads and short circuits.

process.name: Make Surge Protector
process.description: A surge protector protects electrical devices in alternating current (AC) circuits from voltage spikes, which can arise from a variety of causes including lightning strikes in the vicinity and have a very short duration measured in microseconds. It limits the voltage supplied to electrical devices to a certain threshold, by short-circuiting current to ground or absorbing the spike when a transient occurs, thus avoiding damage to the appliances and devices connected to it.

process.name: Make Metal Oxide Varistor
process.description: A metal-oxide varistor is a surge protecting electronic component with an electrical resistance that varies with the applied voltage. It is made of sintered ceramic metal-oxide materials protecting against excessive transient voltages from sensitive components when triggered.
